00020 Reset::Reset(QDomNode& resetNode): value_(-1), valueAttributes_(), mask_(-1),
00021 maskAttributes_() {
00022 
00023         // go through each node
00024         for (int i = 0; i < resetNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00025                 QDomNode tempNode = resetNode.childNodes().at(i);
00026 
00027                 if (tempNode.nodeName() ==      QString("spirit:value")) {
00028                         value_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue().toInt();
00029                         General::parseAttributes(tempNode, valueAttributes_);
00030                 }
00031                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:mask")) {
00032                         mask_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue().toInt();
00033                         General::parseAttributes(tempNode, maskAttributes_);
00034                 }
00035         }
00036 
00037         // if mandatory value was not found
00038         if (value_ < 0) {
00039                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory value missing in spirit:"
00040                                 "reset"));
00041         }
00042         return;
00043 }
00044 
00045 Reset::Reset( const Reset& other ):
00046 value_(other.value_),
00047 valueAttributes_(other.valueAttributes_),
00048 mask_(other.mask_),
00049 maskAttributes_(other.maskAttributes_) {
00050 }
00051 
00052 Reset& Reset::operator=( const Reset& other ) {
00053         if (this != &other) {
00054                 value_ = other.value_;
00055                 valueAttributes_ = other.valueAttributes_;
00056                 mask_ = other.mask_;
00057                 maskAttributes_ = other.maskAttributes_;
00058         }
00059         return *this;
00060 }

00062 Reset::~Reset() {
00063 }
00064 
00065 void Reset::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00066         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:reset");
00067 
00068         // if mandatory value is not defined
00069         if (value_ < 0) {
00070                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory value is not defined"));
00071         }
00072         else {
00073                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:value");
00074 
00075                 General::writeAttributes(writer, valueAttributes_);
00076                 writer.writeCharacters(QString::number(value_));
00077 
00078                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:value
00079         }
00080 
00081         // if optional mask has been defined
00082         if (mask_ >= 0) {
00083                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:mask");
00084 
00085                 General::writeAttributes(writer, maskAttributes_);
00086                 writer.writeCharacters(QString::number(mask_));
00087 
00088                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:mask
00089         }
00090 
00091         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:reset
00092 }

00095         return mask_;

00099         return maskAttributes_;
